signals.reason: Bearish bias observed: price fell from ~214.19 to ~213.66, EMA9 is below EMA21, recent candles show more red than green, RSI around mid‑range, MACD slightly negative, Stochastic below 50, Bollinger Bands are narrowing indicating low volatility. Combined signals suggest a short‑term down move.
